heading: Photo Gallery App
main_desc: This app is built using a popular JavaScript library 'React'. The functionality is simple. It fetches photos from Flickr. If you search anything through this app, it will search photos from flickr with the keywords entered and the photos will be rendered.

heading: Zultan
main_desc: A platform where vendors can sign up and sell their products and users can buy directly from them.

heading: Azad & Sons
desc: A static website for a business.
main_desc: Website for a business where potential customers can take a look at the products and get to know about the features they provide.

heading: Employee Directory
main_desc: An employee directory which communicates with a third-party API and displays random employees.
